name: Swolbold
description: The Swolbold is a medium humanoid characterized by significant physical strength, marked by its notable strength score of 19. It wears scale mail, offering decent protection, but moves slowly at a speed of 20 feet.
memorable: Excels in grappling and physical confrontations, leveraging its Pack Tactics for advantage in group combat.
goals: Typically seeks to engage in physical confrontations and outmaneuver opponents during combat.
relations: Often found in groups, coordinating with allies to maximize combat effectiveness.
environment: Can be found in various terrains, usually in groups due to its reliance on Pack Tactics.
strengths: Possesses high strength and resilience, along with damage resistance to bludgeoning.
weaknesses: Sunlight Sensitivity imposes disadvantages in bright light, affecting attack rolls and perception.
attacks: Utilizes a Slam attack grapple opponents, and can deal additional damage through its Crush action.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics allows it to gain advantage on attack rolls when allied creatures are nearby.
equipment: Wears scale mail for increased protection.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, enabling it to see in dim light and darkness.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, enhancing its effectiveness in physical contests.
additional_information: Leaping Attack allows for surprise slam attacks after dashing.
High Strength score grants significant melee capabilities.
Can restrain opponents when successfully grappling.
Weak in daylight due to Sunlight Sensitivity.
Communicates in Draconic, facilitating interaction with certain creatures.
